definition: to be lenient/to relent/to be reluctant to make a hard decision/to think twice
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
(do a manual task) until one's hands go limp with exhaustion

sentences.english: We must not be soft on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 我們對敵人絕不能手軟。

sentences.english: Woman's softheartedness, with man's hypocrisy, proportional to.
sentences.chinese: 女人的心慈手軟，與男人的口是心非，成正比。

sentences.english: If the investigation turns up hidden corruption, we will also deal with this according to the law and there will not be any soft-pedaling.
sentences.chinese: 如果牽涉到腐敗，我們一定會依法處理，絕不手軟。

sentences.english: But I'll take TMI over black lungs any day.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我寧願發短信發到手軟，也不願染上黑肺病。

sentences.english: We demand therefore the ruthless confiscation of all war profits.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們要求毫不手軟地沒收一切戰爭所得。

sentences.english: Don't treat those criminals with kid gloves.
sentences.chinese: 不要對那些罪犯心慈手軟。

sentences.english: Don't treat these murderers with kid gloves.
sentences.chinese: 不要對這些殺人犯心慈手軟。

sentences.english: Hope are soft PM will not be soft on this spy.
sentences.chinese: 希望軟蛋總理不會對這個間諜手軟。

sentences.english: We should not be soft-hearted towards those who killed people and seized their goods.
sentences.chinese: 我們對那些殺人越貨的傢伙不要心慈手軟。

sentences.english: But my husband hash is weaknesses, and he is so weak as to relent towards this Doctor.
sentences.chinese: 但是他有他的弱點，他對醫生心慈手軟。

sentences.english: The President could continue to bash Democrats as being soft on crime.
sentences.chinese: 總統可能會繼續抨擊民主黨人對待犯罪活動心慈手軟。

sentences.english: They let the banks off and we have to beg and plead.
sentences.chinese: 他們對銀行心慈手軟，我們卻要低聲下氣。

sentences.english: He wanted grit, determination and unkindness .
sentences.chinese: 德尚呼喚勇氣和堅定，拒絕心慈手軟。

definition: to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
to have perfect mastery of sth/to be up to the mark
